name: BrickOut
description:
Brickout is a funny game. The aim of the game is to destroy all the bricks and collect any falling power-ups to move to the next level.

The game is an ordinary arknoid, with cute graphics and good music. There are 20 levels in the game, can you pass them all?

Why buy our game?

- Cute graphics
- Pleasant music
- 20 interesting levels
- the game will run on almost any computer =)

Good luck and fun playing!
